Room.Name: Hafnia Circle
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northern circumference of the Elven city of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: A majestic white temple stands on the north side of the circle. The entrance appears to be a little bit to the west. Beside the temple is a smaller building with a sign outside that says, "Fraternal Order in the Mystical Self-Appreciation of Tall Elves." The door is open.
